Question & Options:
In the movie 'X-Men: First Class' (2011), which composer created the incidental music, having previously worked with director Vaughn on 'Kick-Ass' (2010)?
Options:
A. Hans Zimmer
B. Henry Jackman
C. John Williams
D. Alan Silvestri

In the 2011 movie 'X-Men: First Class', which composer drew inspiration from John Barry's musical themes characterized by a 'posh pop' style?
Options:
A. Hans Zimmer
B. Henry Jackman
C. John Williams
D. Alan Silvestri

In the movie 'X-Men: First Class' (2011), which composer produced a 'Superman-style theme' in the final parts of the film?
Options:
A. Hans Zimmer
B. John Williams
C. Henry Jackman
D. Michael Giacchino

In the movie 'X-Men: First Class' released in 2011, which company released the original score album digitally?
Options:
A. Warner Bros. Records
B. Sony Classical Records
C. Universal Music Group
D. Columbia Records

In the movie 'X-Men: First Class', which was released in 2011, what significant event related to its physical release occurred on July 4, 2011?
Options:
A. The film premiered in theaters
B. The film was released on DVD
C. The film won an award
D. The film started filming
Correct Answer: The film was released on DVD
